summary: This week's release brings the forest to life with falling leaves and season-reactive tree colors, plus a breathing animation for the logo. I also converted the engine's route files and utils to TypeScript for better module resolution, and added subdomain routing for internal projects.

features: update logo and favicon to new hashtag design
add logo to header and footer
add optional color prop to Logo component
add /forest page with logo-based tree visualization (#81)
add trunk color customization to Logo and new tree components (#82)
add nature palette system and TreeAspen component (#83)
add falling leaves to forest page (#85)
add subdomain routes for internal projects
fixes: build engine package before landing deployment
filter milestones to only show version releases
remove duplicate fill attribute in TreeCherry SVG paths
polish assets and fix dark mode in Asset Viewer (#84)
improve TreeBirch and TreeAspen leaf shapes (#86)
refine falling leaves animation and behavior (#87)
improve forest page layout and autumn color reactivity (#88)
fix forest page tree colors and layout positioning (#90)
make tree component colors reactive to season changes
make season toggle icon-only and fix falling leaves visibility (#92)
reduce falling leaves distance and move toggle to bottom right (#93)
add breathing animation and fix reactivity (#94)
convert utils to TypeScript and add JSDoc types to composables (#95)
convert route files to TypeScript for proper module resolution
docs: add Lattice logo to README header
fix logo positioning in README header
backfill repository snapshots for v0.6.0, v0.6.1, v0.6.2
